0411149C 987B01A6

xx = Mag Color ID (00 .. 11)

Equipped Mag Color Modifier v1 (Temporary) [Ralf]
20111494 7C781B78
04113E74 386000xx
E2000001 80008000

xx = Mag Color ID (00 .. 11)

Equipped Mag Color Modifier v2 (Temporary) [Ralf]
20111494 7C781B78
041114A8 3CA08000
041114B0 60A5C390
0600C390 00000010
3F800000 rrrrrrrr
gggggggg bbbbbbbb
E2000001 80008000

rrrrrrrr = Red   (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, 0.0 .. 1.0)
gggggggg = Green (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, 0.0 .. 1.0)
bbbbbbbb = Blue  (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, 0.0 .. 1.0)

Merge Color Modifier (Temporary) [Ralf]
20118238 7FC3F378
0600C590 00000030
807E0024 28030000
41820024 881E00EE
2800003A 41800018
28000049 41810010
3C00rrgg 6000bbFF
90030798 4810BCA4
0411825C 4BEF4334
E2000001 80008000

rr = Red   (00 .. FF)
gg = Green (00 .. FF)
bb = Blue  (00 .. FF)


Default Colors (rrggbb)

00F5B3 - Cyan       (Anti & Resta Merge)
0867FF - Dark Blue  (Deband Merge)
3FCCE1 - Light Blue (Barta, Gibarta, Rabarta & Blue Merge)
EBE700 - Yellow     (Zonde, Gizonde, Razonde & Yellow Merge)
FF2138 - Red        (Shifta Merge)
FF713F - Orange     (Foie, Gifoie, Rafoie & Red Merge)
